Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 134th overall pick, by New York in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/10/2015, off Ruben Figueredo (KC)...
Earned first career win on 4/10/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/11/2016 to a 3-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis (C) on 4/6/2018 (Going to CIN: P Nathan Hernandez, 2B Bill Scott. Going to STL: P Christopher Engstrom)...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 2/2/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
